import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;
class numofnum{
public static boolean prime(int x){
int to;
if(x==1)
return false;
if(x%2==0)
to=x/2;
else
to=(x/3);
for(int i=2;i<=to;i++){
if(x%i==0)return false;}
return true;}
public static void main(String args[])throws IOException{
Scanner cons=new Scanner(System.in);
PrintWriter output=new PrintWriter(System.out);
int t,a,b,ans;
//System.out.println("Lets test!");
t=cons.nextInt();
while(t-->0){
ans=0;
a=cons.nextInt();
b=cons.nextInt();
for(int i=a;i<=b;i++){
int sum=0,d=i;
while(d!=0){
sum+=(d%10);
d/=10;
}
if(prime(sum))
ans++;}
output.println(ans);
} 
output.close();
}}
